short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily send messages to multiple users at once, streamlining communication and saving you time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a powerful tool designed to streamline your communication on Facebook Business Manager. Easily send messages to multiple users simultaneously, saving you time and effort. With a user-friendly interface and robust features like word count tracking, debouncing for smooth performance, and progress tracking, this extension ensures that your messages are sent efficiently and error-free. Ideal for businesses looking to manage communications effectively, Pizzfb helps you maintain consistent, timely interactions with your audience. Compatible with Chrome version 88 and above.
